title: Article 7: Rolls-Royce plans mini nuclear reactors by 2029
description: Mini nuclear reactors could be generating power in the UK by the end of the decade.

title: Article 6: Molecule modification could improve reprocessing of spent nuclear fuel
description: The reprocessing of spent nuclear fuel could become safer and more efficient in future after researchers found a way to modify the structure of molecules to remove radioactive materials.

title: Artcile 5 : Researchers perfect nanoscience tool for studies of nuclear waste storage
description: Studying radiation chemistry and electronic structure of materials at scales smaller than nanometers, scientists prepared samples of clay in ultra-thin layers. Working at the TRIUMF particle accelerator, they bombarded the samples with antimatter subatomic particles. They found their system is a proven tool for radiation studies of material to be used to store nuclear waste -- important for Canadian nuclear industry looking to build its first geological repository.

title: Article 4 : Alert system for failing nuclear plant pipes uses thin films and sound vibrations
description: The objective is to detect the changes in the polymer film that happening inside the pipe

title: Article 3: Six degrees of nuclear separation
description: For the first time, scientists have printed 3D parts that pave the way to recycling up to 97 percent of the waste produced by nuclear reactors.

title: Article 2: Your phone could reveal your radiation exposure after a nuclear disaster
description: Testing personal electronics could help people who need lifesaving treatment get it faster

title: Article 1: Safer Nuclear Reactors Are on the Way
description: Resilient fuels and innovative reactors could enable a resurgence of nuclear power
